<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8" />
    <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0" />
    <title> My Fav Food</title>
    <style>
      h1 {
        position: absolute;
        top: 140px;
        left: 250px;
      }
      h3 {
        color: black;
        text-align: center;
      }
          p{
        color: white;
        text-align: center;
      }
      .food_image {
        width: 50%;
        height: 50%;
      }

      img {
        height: 30%;
        display: block;
        margin-left: auto;
        margin-right: auto;
        width: 50%;
      }
      span {
        padding-left: 60px;
      }
    </style>
  </head>

  <body>
    <div>
      <div>
        <div style="background-color:aquamarine" class="food_image">
          <img
            id="titleImage"
            src="data:image/jpeg;base64," width="250" heigth="250"
            alt="pic3"
          />
          <h1 id="titleName">I Love Foods !!</h1>
        </div>
        <div style="background-color:powderblue" class="food_image">
          <h3 id="favFood1">BRIYANI</h3>
          <p id="foodDescription1">Keep calm and add dum to your <i>briyani</i></p>
          <img id="favFoodImage1"
            src="https://recipes.timesofindia.com/thumb/msid-54308405,width-1600,height-900/54308405.jpg" width="250" height="190"
            alt="pic2" width="150" height="150"
          />
        </div>
        <div style="background-color:brown" class="food_image">
          <h3 id="favFood2">EVENING FRIES</h3>
          <p id="foodDescription2">A crispy golden potato sticks </p>
          <img id="favFoodImage2"
            src="https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcTatfmjlC_knkvGS9NjHyph905-iD9uZ5ihrg&usqp=CAU" width="250" height="190"
            alt="pic1"
          />
        </div>
        <div style="background-color:rgb(21,21,148)" class="food_image">
          <h3 id="favFood3">DESSERT</h3>
          <p id="foodDescription3">Without dessert a food  is<b> incomplete</b></p>
          <img id="favFoodImage3"
            src="https://images-gmi-pmc.edge-generalmills.com/7c1096c7-bfd0-4806-a794-1d3001fe0063.jpg" width="250" height="190"
            alt="pic4"
          />
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  </body>
  <script>
    function myFunction() {
      var x = document.getElementById("images");
      if (x.style.display === "none") {
        x.style.display = "block";
      } else {
        x.style.display = "none";
      }
    }
  </script>
</html>
